snippet: Gov. Rick Scott, who urged a crackdown on immigration four years ago, is throwing his support behind a bill that would allow Florida students who are in the country illegally to pay in-state college tuition rates.
abstract: Florida Gov Rick Scott is throwing his support behind a bill that will allow students who are in the country illegally to pay in-state college tuition rates; Scott urged a crackdown on immigration four years ago.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Rick Scott, who urged a crackdown on immigration four years ago, is throwing his support behind a bill that would allow Florida students who are in the country illegally to pay in-state college tuition rates.

headline.main: Florida: Governor Supports Bill Lowering Tuition for Illegal Immigrants
headline.print_headline: Florida: Governor Supports Bill Lowering Tuition for Illegal Immigrants
